name: Remember his Name
description:
Your adventure as a bard starts here. You’ll visit a total of 5 villages. You’ll need to find a balance between telling the true story of the King Andreval and telling beautiful lies which will please the masses. Indeed, you’ll need money to travel. Keep an eye on each village’s interests to know what can please them.

A Ludum Dare 46 entry - theme : Keep it alive

CREDITS
